name: UC AutoNumeric
description: Plug-ins Pro UC AutoNumeric is an Oracle APEX plug-in designed to enhance the look of any application by formatting numbers into your desired formats and currencies. In addition to formatting, the UC AutoNumeric plug-in also supports the coloring of text or number fields which improves your user's experience. The plug-in is built on top of the AutoNumeric.js library and uses NLS settings to detect database settings for ., or .,.
